name: Sol System (Van Andrew)
description:
Sol System is a real-time-strategy game where you command a battalion of ships in a tug-of-war for resources.

Scrap is hard to come by and every unit matters.

You'll always be out-numbered so you'll have to play it smart.

Features:

  • Duke it out in eight maps focusing on new combat scenarios 
  • Command a variety of units from shielded tanks to elusive snipers
  • Layers of depth in directing countering each unit with another
  • Freeze time freely to plan your next move
  • Adaptive game director AI to cater for each difficulty

Source code is available on Github. Created as a game dev sprint in two months.
